Introduction.Title: No Description Available
Introduction.Content: Yuanwu owns a boxing gym where he teaches <te href=850114>Leihuangquan</te> and health management. He is well-respected in the community for his cordial demeanor and pleasant temperament.

Tags.TagDesc: Reduces the Vibration Strength of targets more effectively
Boosts the interruption resistance of a specific Resonator in the team

Skins.Name: An Elegant Cut
Skins.BgDescription: A tailored suit over a form-fitting set of boxing attire, accentuating Yuanwu's long-limbed and powerful physique.

Skills.SkillDescribe:
Basic Attack

Yuanwu performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Electro DMG.


Heavy Attack

Yuanwu consumes STA to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.


Mid-air Attack

Yuanwu consumes STA to launch a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Electro DMG.


Dodge Counter

Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Thunder Wedge

Yuanwu summons Thunder Wedge, dealing Electro DMG, and forms a Thunder Field centered on the Thunder Wedge. Thunder Wedge lasts for 12s.
Forte Circuit Rumbling Spark and Resonance Liberation Blazing Might will immediately detonate Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge on the field, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Resonance Skill DMG.


Thunder Field

The active character gains the effects below when in the Thunder Field: a Coordinated Attack from Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is triggered when attacks hit a target, dealing Electro DMG. This can be triggered once every 1.2s. The effect lasts for 1.5s.
Awaken the power of thunder and provide Forte Circuit Lightning Infused status to all characters on a nearby team for 10s, then perform a powerful blow that deals Electro DMG.
The DMG multiplier of Resonance Skill Thunder Uprising is increased by 40%, and its reduction efficiency of enemy Vibration Strength is enhanced.

The ranges of the Resonance Skills Thunder Field and Thunder Uprising are greatly expanded. When switched off the field during combat, if "Readiness" is not full, Yuanwu will automatically leave 1 Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge in place.
Attack the target, dealing Electro DMG.

Rumbling Spark

When "Readiness" is full, hold Resonance Skill to consume all "Readiness" and cast Rumbling Spark, dealing Electro DMG and entering the Lightning Infused state.


Thunder Uprising

When "Readiness" is full, Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge will be replaced with Thunder Uprising, dealing Electro DMG.


Lightning Infused

The character in Lightning Infused state has a greatly increased resistance to interruption.
When Yuanwu is in this state:
-Basic Attacks: Hit targets in a larger range, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency.
-Heavy Attacks: Have increased attack speed, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency.
-Dodge Counters: Have increased attack speed, reduce enemy Vibration Strength with increased efficiency.
-Use Basic Attack within 3s after casting a Heavy Attack or a successful Counterattack to cast Thunderweaver, dealing Electro DMG, considered as Basic Attack DMG.
-Does not recover "Readiness".


Readiness

Yuanwu can hold up to 100 "Readiness".
When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is on the field, Yuanwu gains 6 "Readiness" every second, even when he is not the active character;
When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge hits a target with a Coordinated Attack, Yuanwu gains 5 "Readiness".

SkillAttributes.attributeName: Lightning Infused Basic Attack Stage 1 DMG
Lightning Infused Basic Attack Stage 2 DMG
Lightning Infused Basic Attack Stage 3 DMG
Lightning Infused Basic Attack Stage 4 DMG
Lightning Infused Basic Attack Stage 5 DMG
Lightning Infused Heavy Attack STA Cost

Skills.SkillDescribe: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking.
Yuanwu unleashes thunderbolts in an area centered around the skill target, greatly reducing the Vibration Strength of enemies upon impact.

Info.Title: No Description Available
Info.Content: Yuanwu owns a boxing gym where he teaches <te href=850114>Leihuangquan</te> and health management. He is well-respected in the community for his cordial demeanor and pleasant temperament.

TalentDoc.Title: Resonance Evaluation Report
TalentDoc.Content:
Evaluation Basis: [Resonance Assessment 1425-G]

The exact time of Resonator Yuanwu's Awakening is unclear. Resonator Yuanwu recounted that he was exposed to powerful electrical energy for extended times before his Awakening.

Resonator Yuanwu's Tacet Mark is located on the right side of his neck. After his Awakening, blue crystal-like structures appeared on his front limbs, with scar-like tissue visible on his hands and wrists. These changes have since stabilized.

Resonator Yuanwu has extraordinary control over the frequency fluctuations of his body. He can engineer the amplitude and range of his frequencies in an instant, seemingly without doing any harm to himself. Tests have concluded that he is 82.58% more proficient in manipulating frequencies than the average Resonator.

The Resonance Spectrum Pattern of Yuanwu has been observed to align closely with that of thunder. A strong Syntony reaction has been observed, yet the cause of Yuanwu's Awakening remains unclear.
Analysis of test samples has revealed a non-convergent Rabelle's Curve with a gradual rise. Resonator Yuanwu is thereby classified as a Natural Resonator.

TalentCertification.Title: Overclock Diagnostic Report
TalentCertification.Content:
Resonator Yuanwu's waveform graph shows elliptical fluctuations. Pattern of the Time Domain appears stable with no abnormal waveforms observed.

Resonant Criticality: Relatively high. Resonator Yuanwu's frequency displays high stability with minimal risk of Overclocking.

Previous records indicate no history of Overclocking; however, in Resonator Yuanwu's adolescence, during the earliest recorded use of his Resonance Ability, there was a near Overclocking event that produced violent frequency fluctuations and uncontrolled behavior. The incident was classified as a Class 2 hazard and archived under code EX42978.

Subsequent examinations revealed that this episode was caused by emotional distress. No aftereffect of Overclocking was noted.

Presently, Resonator Yuanwu's psychological state is deemed stable and healthy. Routine examinations are advised to prevent future incidents of Overclocking.

ResonantChain.AttributesDescription: When Yuanwu is in Forte Circuit's Lightning Infused state, his Basic Attack Speed is increased by 20%, and his Heavy Attack Speed is increased by 20%.
Intro Skill Thunder Bombardment additionally recovers 15 Resonance Energy for Yuanwu.
When the Coordinated Attacks of Resonance Skill's Thunder Wedge hits a target, the damage is additionally increased by 20% of Yuanwu's DEF.
When casting Resonance Liberation Blazing Might, the on-field character will gain a Shield equal to 200% of Yuanwu's DEF for 10s.
When Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge is on the field, Yuanwu's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus is increased by 50%.
All team members nearby within the range of Resonance Skill Thunder Wedge will gain a 32% DEF increase, lasting 3s.

Stories.Title: Popular Boxing Gym
Stories.Content:
Yuanwu maintains a simple daily routine. Every day in the early morning, he opens up his gym and proceeds to clean the pieces of training equipment one by one. Then he boils a pot of tea and greets customers while savoring it.

For those seeking to learn martial arts, Yuanwu assesses their physique and current condition before suggesting a suitable style. The intensity of training can be tailored to individual preferences, whether for physical fitness or making a name in the martial arts world. Every customer is heard attentively, with Yuanwu patiently crafting a personalized practice plan for their goals. Even those who enter without a clear purpose are welcomed with warm hospitality and offered guidance in exploring their interests.

As soon as a client steps through the gym's front door, Yuanwu's kind eyes immediately meet theirs.

"Leave your worries behind and lift your spirits in our gym. Let's start with some easy punches to unwind."

From just a few moves and punches, Yuanwu can tell the guest's current physical condition and recommend a suitable training plan.

"Your posture is slouched, and your walk lacks stability... The lower back muscles appear strained. Try this set of moves: three slow punches followed by one fast. This should provide relief."

After practicing as per his instructions, the customer should feel a significant sense of relaxation, both mentally and physically. Before leaving, Yuanwu would say goodbye with just the right amount of genuine concern, almost like an old friend.

"Feeling better now? That's good. And don't forget to ease up on those usual tense days. Take this pack of tea with you, it'll help you unwind."

Among the numerous boxing gyms of various sizes in Jinzhou, only Yuanwu's gym enjoys such sustained popularity.

Stories.Title: Bad Bargain
Stories.Content:
It is said that Yuanwu Boxing Gym's owner is willing to help his customers with any kind of trouble, even those not related to working out.

One day, Mahe, a customer usually focused and devoted during workouts, was suddenly off his game. Yuanwu picked up on that and asked him if something was wrong. Mahe's demeanor was somber as he led Yuanwu to the gym's locker, where he pulled out a delicate dinner plate from his belongings.

The plate had a circle of small red flowers on the edge. Yuanwu recognized it as an enamel craft from overseas. The flowers were perfect, except for a small missing piece of the gold rim. The entire plate appeared incomplete without it.

It was a gift Mahe prepared for Panhua. A few years ago, when Panhua Restaurant opened, Mahe promised that he would find the world's most beautiful dinner plate to serve the world's most flavorful meals. Even though the two of them later parted ways due to differences in ideals, Mahe still remembered his promise.

He stuck to his ideals, but couldn't let go of his affection for her.

For years, he searched for the perfect dinner plate, one that wasn't too flashy or tacky. Finally, his eyes landed on this simple yet elegant piece - white with red flowers. It was just right.

The plate was expensive, and he had a hard time securing the funds to buy it. His anxiety mounted as he debated whether to give the gift. Would it be appropriate? Should he send it anyway? During his hesitation, a section of the filigree gold rim that adorned the plates went inexplicably missing. He asked all the vendors in Jinzhou, but they either weren't familiar with imported porcelain or didn't dare to attempt fixing such valuable items. Mahe was left in a predicament.

Having listened to Mahe's situation, Yuanwu gently picked up the dinner plate, telling Mahe to come pick it up a week later.

When Mahe came back, the flowers were perfectly arranged in a circle, with no signs of repair.

In return, Yuanwu only asked Mahe to bring him and the repaired plate to Panhua Restaurant for a meal.

Served on the beautiful plate adorned with enameled flowers, the spicy, fragrant dishes looked even more enticing. Panhua's smile looked peculiarly charming that day, and the usually reticent Mahe managed to put a smile on his face too. It was truly an enjoyable dinner.

No matter how popular the gym was as a business, to charge so little for work like this seemed like a bad bargain to many.

Yuanwu, however, simply shrugged it off with a smile, as if money was the least important thing to him.

Stories.Title: Lightning on Stage
Stories.Content:
Located on the frontier, Jinzhou boasts a robust martial arts culture, featuring numerous gyms of varying sizes. In this relatively tranquil era, the once stringent and harsh customs governing duels gradually waned, making way for more "amicable" consultations and exchanges between gyms.

Where people gather, politics inevitably follows. Despite the activities being cloaked under the banner of exchanges, behind the scenes, individuals engaged in secret competitions, employing every means to emerge victorious. After all, this provides a rare opportunity for publicity. A simple statement from the winner about their affiliated gym brings about a surge in attention and lucrative business contracts.

As the event gains more influence, an increasing number of gyms decide to participate. Surprisingly, even Yuanwu, known for his indifference to fame and fortune, threw his hat into the ring.

Yuanwu's gym was already a flourishing and enviable business. His participation immediately stirred up trouble among some vested interests, with the most perturbed being the previous top-ranker, Wenxi. Wenxi, a businessman, treated both his gym and participation in the event as mere publicity tools for his weapon workshop, emphasizing commercial benefits. Notably, his top rank was purchased, not earned.

Understanding Yuanwu's capabilities and recognizing that his gym was not overly corporate, Wenxi personally visited and extended a tempting offer to buy out Yuanwu. However, Yuanwu rejected the proposal without a second thought.

Unfazed, Wenxi resorted to paying substantial sums to some of Yuanwu's regulars to divulge every detail of Yuanwu's boxing techniques. He then went on to bribe the referees and staff overseeing the finals, ensuring they turned a blind eye to the tampering he did with the fighters' suits.

On the day of the finals, a surprising surge of thunder filled the air, only to dissipate in an instant. Between the flash and the sudden calm, both suits were struck open. The scorching thunder precisely hit the costumes, avoiding unprotected skin; a little further, and the fighters' joints would have been burned. The exposed inner workings of the broken suits revealed all the clandestine schemes, causing an uproar among the spectators and thus leading to the suspension of the match.

Following an investigation, the horrifying thunder during the match was attributed to accidents caused by the concealed devices within the suits. Simultaneously, Wenxi's weapon workshop, responsible for manufacturing such devices, came under scrutiny.

Before long, the workshop mysteriously vanished, fading into oblivion along with the rigged fighting events.

After the storm had settled, Yuanwu Boxing Gym returned to its usual lively state, a small haven bustling with patrons. For the sharp-eyed customers, a subtle difference might be observed–a few familiar faces were absent from the crowd coming in and out of the premises.

Stories.Title: Soothing Tea
Stories.Content:
The standout feature that sets Yuanwu Boxing Gym apart from others is the emphasis on comfort.

Under Boss Yuanwu's guidance, practitioners go through their routines, ending each session by wiping away the sweat and indulging in a pot of tea. The comfort! Whether practicing the nimble Xianfengquan, the powerful Leihuangquan, or the flexible Sanfuquan, Yuanwu has paired each style of boxing with a specific tea boasting complementary benefits. Practitioners, sipping the hot brew after their workouts, relax their muscles, invigorate circulation, and dispel fatigue.

Yuanwu personally tested these tea formulas before handing them over to the neighboring teahouse, which thrives with a booming business. Requests for tea bookings are usually made months in advance, and while occasional delays occur, they never affect Yuanwu's orders to be delivered as scheduled. Speculations arise about Yuanwu not being the ordinary, idle gym boss he appears to be, but rather a big shot overseeing multiple enterprises. Could this highly sought-after tea be just another facet of his business?

When confronted with inquiries, Yuanwu merely smiles and hands over a cup of tea, saying, "Stop chasing shadows. Have some tea and refresh. Sweat more, conjecture less." After a practice session and a cup of tea, with the nose filled with the fresh aroma, doubts and anxieties disperse with the droplets of sweat. Questions about Yuanwu's wealth and how he accumulates it become irrelevant. A profound sense of relaxation envelops the whole body, momentarily dispelling worldly plots and pursuits.

In this world, most things demand pace and balance. When tired, take a break and enjoy some tea. It's a moment to pause, refresh, and then continue.

Stories.Title: Timeless Heritage
Stories.Content:
Yuanwu Boxing Gym was once renowned as the gym for Leihuangquan successors. The gym boasted countless honors, and each of its masters achieved fame across Huanglong.

Leihuangquan's reputation rests on its aggressive style, but such intensity often comes at a cost. Unfortunately, the last three masters met rather unfortunate fates, with the most recent one experiencing a particularly tragic downfall. Rumor has it that he, in the heat of competition, punched through the boxing equipment, violating the rules and leading to his expulsion. Seeking solace from the blow to his career, he embarked on a ship tour, only to encounter a fatal thunderstorm. Coincidentally, he possessed a skill for manipulating thunder, and in a twist of cruel irony, he succumbed to the very force he once controlled. It seems that karma refuses to let anyone go.

As the property agent finished his introduction of the gym's history, he paused to gauge the middle-aged man's reaction. "This property isn't really auspicious. Do you still want to buy?" The man simply smiled and nodded, undeterred.

"Well, I've said everything I have to," the agent sighed, cautioning, "If you still want to buy it, go on, but just don't turn it into a martial arts gym again. It's unlucky."

Yuanwu pushed open the creaky wooden door, allowing sunlight to spill into the space. Dormant dust danced in the hard-earned sunlight's warmth, settling on familiar yet weathered furnishings—the worn wooden stakes, the boxing ring with a worn floor, the quiet display case, and dusty medals of honor.

Yuanwu delicately wiped down these objects from the past, along with memories obscured by dust. The wooden stakes bore the marks of his late fellow apprentices' intense practice. The medals in the display case were hard-earned victories, and as for the floor, it was indeed broken by himself.

Back in the match, he knew no fear and no restraint. A single punch shattered the delicate balance maintained by masters over the years, breaking the floor and throwing him into the storm of reality. The storm, which was also called reality, tore apart the young martial artist who knew nothing but fight. Perhaps, as the rumors suggested, he was truly buried at the bottom of the sea.

As the gym reopened under new ownership, a middle-aged owner with a warm smile welcomed customers coming and going. "Welcome to Yuanwu Boxing Gym."

Words.Title: Thoughts: I
Words.Content: Hello there. What will it be for today? Are you here to put in some extra work, or maybe just to loosen up a bit? Of couse, you're welcome for a chat, too. One moment, I'll go make some tea for you.

Words.Title: Thoughts: II
Words.Content: Exercising is essential for us martial artists. Other people may not find the same importance in exercise, since everyone has their own unique strengths. After all, we no longer live in a time where brute force is the only solution. Or rather, brute force never really solved anything.

Words.Title: Thoughts: III
Words.Content: Rumors have been circulating about me, and I don't intend to stop them. My story isn't particularly exciting, but people find amusement in talking about it, that doesn't bother me. And with words about me getting out there, I might end up reeling in a few dunderheads. Whatever impression others may have of me, I trust your judgment will not be swayed. Or, if I may say so, I am happy to accept whatever you think of me.

Words.Title: Thoughts: IV
Words.Content: I did hurt people in the past, sometimes with my hands, and sometimes through other means. Back then, I had to take the initiative... to make sure no more innocent people would fall prey to them. I had experience handling such things, and that was why I felt obligated to help. But I'm not telling you this in response to the rumors. I believe friendship is built on mutual understanding, and now is a good time for you to get to know me better.

Words.Title: Thoughts: V
Words.Content: When it comes to the business world, one is often told that it's impossible to find true friendship. I have to concede, nobody I've ever known has understood me as well as you do. Though my gym has many customers, you are the only one to have become a true friend of mine. You are, and will always be welcome at my gym, my friend.

Words.Title: Yuanwu's Hobby
Words.Content: A steaming cup of tea makes an excellent remedy for sore muscles after an intense workout. It's quite effective, you should give it a try.

Words.Title: Yuanwu's Trouble
Words.Content: Nestled between the borders, <te href=850091>Jinzhou</te> is subject to ever-changing weather. Sustaining the dried fish I've been making for Mimi has been a difficult task... Hmm, I suppose a solution will come to me in due time.

Words.Title: Favorite Food
Words.Content: The solid ingredients of Jinzhou Stew blend effortlessly to form a simple dish. Back in the days when I had to live far away from home, it was the only dish that I could recreate to make me feel close to my roots. I can never have enough of it.

Words.Title: Disliked Food
Words.Content: I'm not a big fan of foods that are hard to chew… Oh, it's got nothing to do with my teeth. I'm just not fond of the prickling sensation of stickiness in my mouth.

Words.Title: Ideals
Words.Content: Well... I just want to maintain the stability I currently enjoy, and maybe keep my hometown safe, if I get the luxury to, haha.

Words.Title: Chat: I
Words.Content: Have I been keeping some kind of secret healthy drink in this flask, you ask? *chuckle* It's really just regular hot tea.

Words.Title: Chat: II
Words.Content: The stiffest tree is often broken by the harshest of winds, whereas the bamboo and willow survive by bending along. Finding harmony between strength and adaptability is integral to lasting success, be it in martial arts, commerce, or all aspects of life.

Words.Title: Birthday Wishes
Words.Content: You're always tied up with affairs, how about relaxing a bit for a change on your birthday? Here, I got you an ordermade massager, some Angelica Tea leaves, and a personalized health management planner for the upcoming year. You really should prioritize your health. Self-care comes before anything else, including helping other people, my friend.

Words.Title: Idle: I
Words.Content: Oh? *chuckles*... Did you smell the dried fish I have?

Words.Title: Idle: II
Words.Content: *Effort Sound*

Words.Title: Idle: III
Words.Content: Please don't worry. I've got it in check.

Words.Title: Self-Introduction
Words.Content: Hello. I am Yuanwu, and I run a boxing gym. It's not a big place, but we make sure every customer is treated with finesse. You're welcome to visit any time.

Words.Title: Join Team: I
Words.Content: Ready to rumble.

Words.Title: Join Team: II
Words.Content: Anything I can help you with?

Words.Title: Join Team: III
Words.Content: It's nice to take a break once in a while.

Words.Title: Ascension: I
Words.Content: I haven't felt this tingling sensation swimming across my veins in a while... So this is all your doing? *chuckle* Looks like this is going to take some time getting used to.

Words.Title: Ascension: II
Words.Content: Now that I've gotten used to it, this power feels robust and flexible. It does have something in common with my <te href=850114>Leihuangquan</te>.

Words.Title: Ascension: III
Words.Content: Thanks to your help, my skills have improved and even my thunderbolts are stronger. Owing to your aid, I might be able to get a couple more scoundrels dealt with.

Words.Title: Ascension: IV
Words.Content: I can't thank you enough. With such power, I feel young and back to my prime days again. They say that time is invaluable. Doesn't that make the gift of power you've bestowed on me priceless? *chuckle*... Now, if you'd allow me some time, I should come up with a way to repay the favor.

Words.Title: Resonance Skill: I
Words.Content: Field of thunder.

Words.Title: Resonance Skill: II
Words.Content: Shock and awe.

Words.Title: Resonance Skill: III
Words.Content: Dropping the pylon.

Words.Title: Resonance Skill: IV
Words.Content: Lightning coming up!

Words.Title: Resonance Liberation: I
Words.Content: Overwhelming power!

Words.Title: Resonance Liberation: II
Words.Content: Resistance is futile!

Words.Title: Resonance Liberation: III
Words.Content: Hear the thunder!

Words.Title: Hit: I
Words.Content: *Effort Sound*

Words.Title: Hit: II
Words.Content: A minor setback.

Words.Title: Hit: III
Words.Content: *Effort Sound*

Words.Title: Injured: I
Words.Content: Nothing to worry about.

Words.Title: Injured: II
Words.Content: Still in the fight.

Words.Title: Injured: III
Words.Content: I need a recharge.

Words.Title: Fallen: I
Words.Content: *Effort Sound*

Words.Title: Fallen: II
Words.Content: The storm dies out...

Words.Title: Fallen: III
Words.Content: Even the stiffest tree... cracks...

Words.Title: Echo Summon
Words.Content: Turned to my advantage.

Words.Title: Echo Transform
Words.Content: Befuddle thy foes.

Words.Title: Intro Skill
Words.Content: Joint operation.

Words.Title: Glider
Words.Content: *Effort Sounds*

Words.Title: Grapple
Words.Content: Surging forward.

Words.Title: Dash
Words.Content: *Effort Sound*

Words.Title: Wall Dash
Words.Content: *Effort Sound*

Words.Title: Supply Chest: I
Words.Content: Might come in handy later.

Words.Title: About Lingyang
Words.Content: Lingyang often visits my gym to play with Mimi just outside the front doors, always carrying a couple of fresh tetras as treats. I guess it might be his thank-you to Mimi for all the agility training they had done together. He sure is a thoughtful young man.

Words.Title: About Jianxin
Words.Content: I am more than happy to get an outstanding training partner like Jianxin by merely offering her a simple meal... Of course, I'm always pleased to spend time with her over a meal, whether she's here to train with me or not.

Words.Title: About Danjin
Words.Content: I can sense a dangerous aura from Danjin's way of fighting... I'm worried that she may have far too much burden on her shoulders at such a young age.

Words.Title: About Chixia
Words.Content: Every morning, when I opened the gym, Chixia was already patrolling the street with exuberant energy. *chuckle*... I must keep up with my exercises too. Can't be outdone by the younger generations.

Words.Title: About Rover
Words.Content: Your poise and comfidence are impressive. Such remarkable character can't possibly be built overnight. I can tell you've experienced far more than I have.

Words.Title: Greeting
Words.Content: Whether you need help with working out or maintaining your health, feel free to come by my gym. We welcome all visitors.

Words.Title: Ascension: V
Words.Content: Since you've gifted me such a precious treasure, I should give you a matching gift in return. Please, take this Tea Pet—it grants you free access to all the boxing gyms and teahouses in <te href=850093>Huanglong</te>. And... if you ever need me, just hand it to any one of the shopkeepers. I will come to your aid as soon as possible, no matter what.

Words.Title: Resonance Skill: V
Words.Content: Rumble in all directions.

Words.Title: Resonance Skill: VI
Words.Content: Maximum voltage.

Words.Title: Enemies Near
Words.Content: Careful.

Words.Title: Sensor
Words.Content: Nice. Let's go check it out.

Words.Title: Supply Chest: II
Words.Content: Found what you're looking for? Good.

Words.Title: Supply Chest: III
Words.Content: Now that's quite the discovery.

Goods.Title: Dried Fish
Goods.Content: Dried fish made from Tetra. The fish is usually brought to Yuanwu Boxing Gym by Lingyang, as a thank-you to Mimi for "sparring" with him. When Mimi can't finish her fish, Yuanwu dries it out for future use.

Goods.Title: Blue Flask
Goods.Content:
The secret of <te href=850114>Leihuangquan</te> lies in the good control of power and balancing combat with mindful self-care. The deadlier the strike, the greater the devotion to health.
That's why Yuanwu always carries a flask with him during his daily activities. Some say it contains his secret potion for staying fit, but in reality, it's usually just ordinary hot water.

Goods.Title: Old Gauntlet
Goods.Content: An antiquated gauntlet, long since out of production. Its exterior shows clear signs of wear and tear from extensive use, with most of its interior components exposed. Yet it has been carefully cleaned and maintained, to the point that every line and crevice on the weapon is still starkly visible.

DescList: Recover Forte Gauge for Coordinated Attacks on hit when Thunder Wedge in on the field
Hold Resonance Skill when Forte Gauge is full to cast Rumbling Spark and enter Lightning Infused state

InputDetails.description: Rumbling Spark: When Forte Gauge is full, hold
